articles.title: Don't Buy Smart Luggage, Buy This Instead
articles.author: ril Miller
articles.excerpt: Travelers from all walks of life want to ensure they can bring their belongings with them to all the new places they visit. With more smart items hitting the market than ever, it's no surprise that…
articles.summary:
Kaspars Grinvalds/Shutterstock.com


Travelers from all walks of life want to ensure they can bring their belongings with them to all the new places they visit. With more smart items hitting the market than ever, it's no surprise that smart luggage sounds appealing to tech-savvy travelers. But is smart luggage worth it?
 
What Is 'Smart Luggage'?


Smart luggage is an umbrella term for 
any bag imbued with smart tech
, such as charging ports, hot spots, GPS tracking, or remote app-based controls.

articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.excerpt: RING doorbell owners should think twice before making any extra smart home purchases if they want to get the most out of their camera. Certain smart speakers and gadgets have more integration with …
articles.summary:
RING doorbell owners should think twice before making any extra smart home purchases if they want to get the most out of their camera.


Certain smart speakers and gadgets have more integration with 
Ring
 than others.


Ring doorbells work best with an Echo Show


Ring is owned by Amazon, so naturally the online retailer wants you to use their smart devices over others.


To get the most out of it, you'll need an Amazon Echo speaker or display.


Rivals like Google Home do work with Ring but there are some huge limitations.

articles.title: Chinese EV Startup Jidu Plans to Use ChatGPT-Like Tech
articles.author: Evelyn Cheng
articles.excerpt: The combined tech aims to improve users' interactivity with the car, the startup said. So-called smart cars typically include voice control.
articles.summary:
Zou Wei | Visual China Group | Getty Images
 
 
 
 
 
Jidu plans to use Apollo with Baidu's ChatGPT-like product, called Ernie bot in English, the startup said.
 
The combined tech aims to improve users' interactivity with the car, the startup said.
 
So-called smart cars like Jidu's planned model typically include voice control.
 
BEIJING — 
Baidu's
 ChatGPT-like product is set to come to electric, assisted-driving cars, startup Jidu said Tuesday.
 
Jidu, backed by Baidu and 
Geely
, is using Baidu's Apollo system for the in-car user interface and assisted driving tech.

articles.title: Celebrating Valentine's Day With a Tech Enthusiast
articles.author: ter.
articles.excerpt: Celebrating Valentine's Day with a tech enthusiast can be a unique and fun experience. If you both love tech, you can incorporate it into your celebration.
articles.summary: Four days remain until Valentine's Day, the ideal occasion to express your love and affection for your significant other —and this significant other could be a tech enthusiast. It can be unusual, fascinating, and fun to celebrate this day with them. If you and your significant other —share a passion for technology, including gadgets, you can include it in your celebration in a variety of ways, such as hosting a gaming night, going on a VR experience, creating something together —possibly an app or software —or any other way that comes to mind.

articles.title: Breville's Pizzaiolo, the Best Indoor Pizza Oven You Can Buy, Is 20% Off
articles.author: Grace Cooper
articles.excerpt: You don't need an outdoor space or warmer weather to enjoy homemade pizza anymore.
articles.summary:
If you're looking around for a new at-home activity this winter, a pizza oven may be just the thing. Pizza ovens usually require an outdoor space and therefore warmer weather, but not this one from Breville. The Pizzaiolo is an indoor-only smart, countertop pizza oven — and the best one you can buy at that. Regularly priced at $1,000, which is high but not unheard of for a high-quality oven, you can get it for a rare 20 percent off (just $800) from now until February 14.

We're big fans of pizza ovens (after all, we've tested quite a few), and the Pizzaiolo is one of our favorites thanks to its indoor-friendly design and smart tech.

articles.title: A policy framework for bridging the gender divide in digital technology courses and careers in Kenya
articles.author: Anthony Luvanda
articles.excerpt: Anthony Luvanda identifies the root causes for the exclusion of girls and young women in Kenya from digital technology courses at all levels of education.
articles.summary: Kenya's digital technology advancements—chief among them the mobile money transfer application referred to as Mpesa—has led to the country's status as an emerging digital economy. However, the long strides in the move toward a fully-fledged digital economy are not reflected in the digital technology workforce with regard to gender balance. While digital technology careers are highly touted as the jobs of the future, women occupy less than 30 percent of digital technology positions in Kenya. The root cause of the problem can be traced to disadvantages that girls and young women accumulate throughout their years in education.

articles.title: Decoding the Drivers of Technology Adoption: An In-Depth Exploration of the Technology Acceptance Model
articles.author: Danny Peng
articles.excerpt: Because new technologies are constantly being developed and changing how we live and work, modern businesses and society need to adopt new…
articles.summary:
Because new technologies are constantly being developed and changing how we live and work, modern businesses and society need to adopt new technology. Organizations and individuals must adapt successfully to new technologies to keep up with the rapid rate of technological innovation and remain competitive and relevant.
The Technology Acceptance Model (TAM), first put forth by researchers at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology in the late 1980s, is one of the most extensively used models for understanding technology uptake (MIT).

articles.author: Alex Ramirez
articles.excerpt: Parents and Guardians, NBC 5, Telemundo 39, BNSF Railway Co., and the National Multicultural Western Heritage Museum would like to invite your high school-age teens, grades 9 – 12 to the 24th Annual…
articles.summary:
Parents and guardians, NBC 5, Telemundo 39, BNSF Railway Co. and the National Multicultural Western Heritage Museum would like to invite your high school-age teens, grades 9 – 12, to the virtual 24th Annual Technology Awareness Day and Technology and College Fair on Saturday, February 11, from 8:30 a.m. – 3:30 p.m.
 
The event aims to educate the youths about the numerous careers in the technology field, as well as challenge the attendees to design and develop their technological solutions.
 
The BNSF Technology Awareness Day is part of the National Black Family Technology Awareness Week.

articles.title: 5 Most Overlooked Electric Gadgets in Smart Home Decor
articles.author: Ali Bajwa
articles.excerpt: As technology advances, the concept of a smart home becomes more attainable than ever before. From voice assistants to security systems, we are all familiar with the many smart gadgets that make our…
articles.summary:
As technology advances, the concept of a smart home becomes more attainable than ever before. From voice assistants to security systems, we are all familiar with the many smart gadgets that make our daily lives easier.


However, there are a few electronic gadgets that often go unnoticed but can make a significant impact on your smart home decor. In this article, we'll discuss the most overlooked electronic gadgets in smart home decor and how they can make your life more comfortable.


Smart Lights


Smart lights can be integrated with other smart home devices, such as smart speakers and smart thermostats, to create a fully integrated and automated smart home.

articles.summary:
Setting up a smart home sound like a daunting task? Worried about expensive components, or tedious and complex installation? Put those concerns to rest, because modern smart devices can be set up by simply plugging them in and connecting them to your wireless network. And with this 
Google Nest Mini
 + Wyze bundle deal, you can start building a smart home system for just $30.
 
The bundle includes Google's Nest Mini speaker, which we rated as one of the 
best smart speakers
 of 2023. The Mini is small, wall-mountable, and offers excellent integration with YouTube and other Google services.

articles.title: Does Homebridge even Matter any more? [Video]
articles.author: Derek Wise
articles.excerpt: Keeping a unified smart home – where any smart phone or home assistant can be used to control any smart home device you have – can be a bit of challenge. Previously, many iPhone users have used…
articles.summary:
Keeping a unified smart home – where any smart phone or home assistant can be used to control any smart home device you have – can be a bit of challenge. Previously, many iPhone users have used Homebridge to connect otherwise unsupported devices to Apple's Home app. But the Matter standard could make that unnecessary, as Matter compatible devices will be compatible with Amazon, Google, and Apple's smart home ecosystems. That begs the question: Will Matter make Homebridge obsolete?
 
Table of contents
 
Homebridge is an open-source software you can run on your computer that essentially translates the commands that Apple's HomeKit uses to commands that other smart devices use.
articles.authors: A Budget,A Reasonably Priced,Compact,Derek Wise,My Latest Camera Upgrade,Sharp,Sigma Art,Very Fast Wide-Angle Lens.

articles.title: Meross Smart Plug Mini review: A good addition to your smart home
articles.author: Nathaniel Pangaro
articles.excerpt: Not everything has to be Matter-compatible. One version of the Meross Smart Plug Mini isn't, and still allows you to control nearly any appliance in your HomeKit setup within a small and light design.
articles.summary:
Not everything has to be Matter-compatible. One version of the Meross Smart Plug Mini isn't, and still allows you to control nearly any appliance in your HomeKit setup within a small and light design.
With a compact design, unchallenging setup, and easy controls, the Meross Smart Plug is a great addition to start turning any home into a smart home that works best for you. 
The Meross Smart Plug Mini is designed like many others of its kind by being built within a rectangular box that plugs right into the wall and then has a three-pronged socket facing outward.

articles.title: Impact Of AI In Smart Homes
articles.excerpt: Are smart houses among the best inventions for a convenient and relaxing living environment? Read this insightful article on impact of AI in smart homes to learn the answer to this question.
articles.summary:
The integration of 
AI in smart homes
 has revolutionized the way we live. 
 
AI-powered smart devices and systems can automate various household tasks, enhance security, and provide real-time insights into energy usage. With the help of voice assistants like Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, homeowners can control lighting, heating, and appliances hands-free. 
 
AI algorithms also enable smart devices to learn from usage patterns and make recommendations for energy efficiency. So, it is safe to say that the impact of AI in smart homes has made life easier, more efficient, and more secure.

articles.summary:
New York Post may be compensated and/or receive an affiliate commission if you buy through our links.
	






Ever since the concept of 
smart homes
 hit the scene, so too have deals for smart, sharp-eyed consumers to save on products to make their homes smarter. 


In fact, some folks are so adept at this, their homes have officially passed into an entirely different league. They're no longer smart homes, they're 
genius homes
, and those homes have their genius owners to thank. 


Genius home owners look just like you or us; they're nearly imperceptible to the human eye.
